entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI - Image 1996. Opinions of the Budapest adult population about Budapest, using bank services.
entry.dcterms:creator: Dávid, Kriszta
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D32i: TÁRKI - Image 1996. Opinions of the Budapest adult population about Budapest, using bank services.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Sági, Matild
Várnai, Gábor
entry.dcterms:description: 1. social relations in the residential environment, opinions and feelings about the residential environment and Budapest, level of infrastructure, pollution of the environment, opinions about the city panorama, the economic and social role of Budapest, the politics of the city leadership 2. using financial and investment services, use of bank account and bank card, forms of savings, choice of banks; the savings of the family and the bank services used by them
entry.dcterms:subject: natural resources and environment
local society, region
trade, industry and markets
income, property and savings
community, urban and rural life
persons and households
survey data
cross-section
From the district of Budapest 1500 persons were selected in proportion to the population based on the data of the Central Registration and Electorial Bureau.
face-to-face interview
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
